title: Ticket #5845: Add option to ClassAd unparsers to print a subset of an ad
description: Printing a subset of an ad's attributes is something we frequently want to do in HTCondor. Handling that in the ClassAd library is easier and more efficient than trying to do so from outside of the library. This also allows us to sort the attributes when desired.
remarks:
2016-Sep-08 15:47:16 by jfrey:
This is not directly user-visible, so no version history entry.
check_ins: 2016-Aug-16 15:03   Check-in [49017]: Add option to ClassAd unparsers to print a subset of an ad. #5845 Add new Unparse() variant that takes a ClassAd and a whitelist of attributes to print. Relies on a new GetComponents() method that also takes a whitelist. The results of both will be sorted by attribute name. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
